lines.gurmukhi: pRym rs AMmiRq inDwn pwn pUrn huie aunmn aunmq ibsm ibsÍws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Praym Ras Anmrit Nidhaan Paan Pooran Hui , Ounaman Ounamat Bisam Bisvaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: When a devotee meditating on His name is satiated with the drinking of loving nectar of Lord's name, he (devotee) enjoys supernatural ecstatic feeling in higher spiritual planes.

lines.gurmukhi: Awqm qrMg bhu rMg AMg AMg Cib Aink AnUp rUp aUp ko pRgws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Aatam Tarang Bahu Rang Ang Ang Chhabi , Anik Anoop Roop Oop Ko Pragaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: With multi-coloured waves of spiritual thoughts growing in his (devotee) mind, every part of his body conveys the glory of the Lord by emittence of strange and unique radiance.

lines.gurmukhi: sÍwd ibsmwd bhu ibibiD surq srb rwg nwd bwd bhu bwsnw subws hY
lines.transliteration_english: Svaad Bisamaad Bahu Bibidhi Surat Saraba , Raag Naad Baad Bahu Baasanaa Soubaas Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The relishment of loving elixir of the Lord's name is astonishing. Enchanting tunes of all the musical modes and their consorts are heard in the ears. The nostrils feel the smell of myriad fragrances.

lines.gurmukhi: prmdBuq bHmwsn isMGwsn mY soBw sBw mMfl AKMfl iblws hY ]112]
lines.transliteration_english: Paramadabhout Brahamaasan Singhaasan Mai , Sobhaa Sabhaa Mandal Akhandal Bilaas Hai ?112?

Shabad OS B.translation: And with the residing of the consciousness in the highest spiritual seat (the tenth orifice), one enjoys the strange and magnificent glory of all the spiritual planes. Staying in that state renders complete stability to the body, mind and soul. It is the
